name: Quizzes
tagline: For the thrill and pursuit of knowledge
description: Pravega '21, the annual undergraduate fest of IISc Bangalore, presents a set of exciting quizzes for you to rack your brains over. So mark your calendars, and be there!

modules.heading: Eligibility and Rules
modules.content:
School and college students (with valid institute ID Card) are allowed to participate. Teams can have upto 3 members. Cross-institutional teams are allowed.
The registration fee is Rs. 50 per team per quiz. However, if the same team is participating in all three quizzes, they can register for all three for a total of Rs. 100.
Registration for each quiz closes 3 hours before the quiz starts.
